ComicInfo.Summary:
A collection of comic strips.
Fake ad for DVD of Governor Mark Sanford's sex scandal.
Problems of very fat people during the old days out west.
This is a parody of ShamWow commercials, with ScamWow as the product.
The Black Spy tricks the White Spy into launching himself into a target with a giant slingshot.
Scenes that might have been from the Star Trek movie.
Parody of things found on Match.com.
Phony ways to acclimate Gitmo detainees into American culture.
Fake Tweets about new Star Trek movie.
Fake diary of President Obama's dog, Bo.
The Black Spy tricks the White Spy into overloading an elevator so that the cable snaps.
Satire on the movie Harry Potter And The Half-Blood Prince.
Various short satires of pop culture.
The stack of money is much taller than normal and represents what the government is spending to bail out companies.
